full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GCOD LUGS KYI GTOR MA BRGYA RTZA GTONG TSUL DRI MED MCHOD SBYIN TSOGS GNYIS BDE BLAG TU RDZOGS PA'I RMAD BYUNG THABS MKHAS MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES GCOD LUGS KYI GTOR MA BRGYA RTZA GTONG TSUL DRI MED MCHOD SBYIN GNYIS BDE BLAG TU RDZOGS PA'I RMAD BYUNG THABS MKHAS MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SNGON GYI LAS SMON BZANG POS 'BREL BA'I BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA THOB CING, MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM GYI YON TAN DANG LDAN PA SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYI 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^ 'TSO MDZAD GU RU YO GI TZA RI AA TZARYA BIKshU SU MA TI DHVA DZAS RTOR 'PHENG KYI DBANG BSKUR BA'I SKABS SU DAR RGYAS GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL RGYAL TSAB RDO RJE'O, ,'DIS KYANG BDAG DANG 'GRO KUN SGRIB GNYIS SBYANG TSOGS GNYIS RDZOGS TE SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
